title: Tariffs on Canadian and Mexican imports begin on Tuesday: Trump
shortDescription: President Donald Trump said Monday that 25% tariffs on imports from Canada and Mexico will go into effect Tuesday, which could start a trade war.

title: Democratic governors recruit government workers laid off by Trump
